description: This file initializes a Milvus vector database, creates a PDF knowledge base, and sets up an agent to answer questions based on the knowledge base.

classes.name: Milvus
classes.description: A class representing the Milvus vector database connection.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for creating a knowledge base from PDF URLs.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the agent's response to a query, optionally in markdown format.
